author: Angel Smith
text:
The City of River Falls is doing structure and position analysis and is interested in seeing org. charts for other Engineering/Public Works departments, especially those in cities with 5,000 – 25,000 population range.  
If you have an organizational chart available in electronic format and would be willing to e-mail it to me at asmith@rfcity.org, I’d really appreciate it. Thanks in advance!
title: Public Works/Engineering Org Charts
